description: From the Publisher My Wide World Books Designed for curious minds, these travel and activity books will take kids from Greece to Kenya and far beyond, with interactive games and inspirational images to help them learn along the way. Children will love learning about world cities, flags, landmarks and global cuisine via interactive games, colouring in and puzzles. Guardians will enjoy watching little ones find entertainment as they learn. My Wide World: Capitals and Flags Take a sneak peek into some of the activities in the My Wide Word: Capitals & Flags book below. My Wide World - Cities & Flags: Activity-filled travel adventure books for curious minds Match the Capital to it's Country Draw a line from the capital city to the flag to the country you'd find it in. HINT: we've started for you. Design City Logos Use lettering to bring the name of your favourite cities to life. Design your own or copy designs for some of the most famous cities in the world for inspiration. Spot the Difference We've taken photos of some pretty special cities around the world and added two differences to each - can you spot them? My Wide World Books: Activity-filled adventures for curious minds Explore the My Wide Word book collection.
